casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Michael MARK Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 1, 2017

Alice Osedach, assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Michele C. Lukban, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 241, 154 A.3d 564 (2017), is denied.

EVELEIGH, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
